message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a product that has the potential to change your life. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to sell it to you for a one-time payment of $1000000. What do you say?
I'd like to pass on this opportunity for now. I'm not convinced that I'm getting a good deal without knowing the product's quality.

If you buy this product now, I'll throw in a second one of equal value absolutely free! That's two products for the price of one. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the special deal. I'm still not sure about the quality of the product, and I don't want to take on the risk of getting two low-quality products.
